title: Maryland man indicted for shooting and killing 3, wounding 2 others
content:
UPPER MARLBORO, Md. (ABC7) —
A grand jury in Prince George’s County indicted a man Friday for killing three people, and wounding two others in a Forestville home back in June.
Police say Lawrence Rogers, 24, of Capitol Heights, shot and killed three people at a house in Forestville and injured two others on June 24. Rogers was seen in surveillance videos in the area and witnesses gave a description to police.
Rogers was found six days later, hiding out in a DC house, and taken into custody.
His court date is pending.
